name: Location Study
description:
I started this as an assignment in level design class and based it on a park near me but it evolved quite a bit past the assignments requirements haha.. if you are feeling adventurous, its possible to get up to the mountains! the hit boxes on the trees allow for some really cheesy maneuvering ;)

Sadly only a windows build for now. UE4's really poor at handling exporting for any other platform :(
